div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 470px; margin-left: 511px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(128, 128, 128); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
Publishes merkel roots for each
batch of events to the blockchain.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 381px; margin-left: 511px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(128, 128, 128); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
Two phase commands when
multiple registries are involved.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 360px; margin-left: 161px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

font.font: Enables public verifiable claims of Granular Certificates.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 580px; margin-left: 321px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

font.font: Conventional blockchain that will store a series of hashes for each merkel tree, ensuring that data within the tree cannot be changed without it being visible.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 360px; margin-left: 621px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

font.font: Other registries that supports the same protocol, enabled cross registry claims.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 230px; margin-left: 71px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(128, 128, 128); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
Executes signed
commands to a registry.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 140px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

font.font: Concept of accounts, users and holdings, manages public-private key pairs.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 240px; margin-left: 501px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(128, 128, 128); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
Can read public data
to verify the authenticity
of claims.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 143px; margin-left: 440px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

font.font:
A user that wants to validate
claims aganst the registry

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 580px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

font.font: Will replace hard-coded rules to a ruleset defined by a shared ownership of the participating registries.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 471px; margin-left: 91px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(128, 128, 128); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
Uses rules defined
by shared group.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 358px; height: 1px; padding-top: 7px; margin-left: 2px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(128, 128, 128); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
text-align: left
text-align: left

div.div: Context diagram of the Registry designed by Project Origin
